page.title: 04My day-Samantha Whatson
page.content: At 7.30 Iget up for school.I have cereal toast and a cup of tea.At 8.15 I walk or ride my bike to school.When I get there I wait for Lena or Helen.Then we talk for a while.Then its time for lessons.On mondays we write down our spellings.After that we do Reading Routes.Then we go out to play.The game we play is called poddy i23.Then we line up and go inside.When we get in we do maths until dinner time.After lunch we go out to play.When we come in we go swimming til 3pm.Then Mr.Conway reads us the BFGThen we go home.
